metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31982 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Sngrep v1.6.0 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via thefunction capture_packet_reasm_ip at /src/capture.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31982` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sngrep - 1.7.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sngrep package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.0-1').
